gw.api.graph.compare

Class EntityGraphComparer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.graph.compare.EntityGraphComparer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphComparer<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ABContactGraphComparer

    public class EntityGraphComparer
extends Object
implements GraphComparer<T>
    Base implementation of a graph comparer using EntityMatchers to match entities of the same type from both graphs. Subclasses must provide the node on the source graph on which the traversal will start.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

        Class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntityGraphComparer(MatcherContext matcherContext, TraversalFilter<T>[] filters)
      Creates an entity graph comparer with the matcher context and (optionally) traversal filters that will be used when traversing the source graph.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EntityComparison compare(Graph<KeyableBean> source, Graph<KeyableBean> compare)
      Compares the source to the compare graph by traversing the source graph and evaluating matches in the compare graph.
      EntityComparison compare(ReadableGraph<KeyableBean> source, ReadableGraph<KeyableBean> compare)
      Compares the source to the compare graph by traversing the source graph and evaluating matches in the compare graph.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EntityGraphComparer

        EntityGraphComparer(MatcherContext matcherContext,
                   TraversalFilter<T>[] filters)
        Creates an entity graph comparer with the matcher context and (optionally) traversal filters that will be used when traversing the source graph.
        Parameters:
        matcherContext - The matching context
        filters - The traversal filters (may be empty)

    • Method Detail

      • compare

        EntityComparison compare(Graph<KeyableBean> source,
                       Graph<KeyableBean> compare)
        Compares the source to the compare graph by traversing the source graph and evaluating matches in the compare graph.
        Parameters:
        source - The source graph
        compare - The comparison graph
        Returns:
        The entity comparison b/n the two graphs

        Compares the source to the compare graph by traversing the source graph and evaluating matches in the compare graph.
        Parameters:

        compare - The comparison graph (view)
        Returns:
        The entity comparison b/n the two graphs
